LED & Electronics Applications

Wire Harness Solutions for LED Lighting

Custom wire assemblies designed for LED lighting and display applications. From residential strips to commercial fixtures, we deliver UL certified solutions optimized for the lighting industry.

LED & Lighting Applications

LED Strip Lighting

Flexible LED strip power connections, jumper cables, and extension assemblies for residential and commercial lighting.

LED Displays & Signs

Digital signage, channel letters, backlight panels, and LED display board wire harnesses.

LED Drivers

LED power supply input/output cables, dimmer control wires, and driver interconnects.

Lighting Fixtures

Ceiling lights, recessed lighting, pendant fixtures, and architectural lighting wire assemblies.

General Electronics

Power supplies, control boards, electronic device internal wiring, and prototype assemblies.

DIY & Hobby

Arduino, Raspberry Pi, maker projects, and hobby electronics wire assemblies.

LED Industry Requirements We Meet

✓ Cost-Effective Production

High-volume manufacturing at competitive prices essential for the LED lighting market's cost sensitivity.

✓ Safety Certifications

UL certified materials and assemblies for compliant LED lighting products.

✓ Custom Lengths

Tailored cable lengths for specific lighting installations and fixture designs.

✓ Quick Turnaround

Fast prototyping and production to meet lighting project schedules and market demands.

✓ Color Coding Options

Standard and custom wire color coding for easy identification during installation.

✓ Strain Relief

Overmolded and mechanical strain relief for durable LED strip and fixture connections.

Wire Harness Forms We Provide

Pre-Crimped Wire Assemblies

Ready-to-connect wire leads for LED strips and modules.

  • • Various lengths
  • • Quick-turn delivery
  • • Color-coded options

Wire-to-Wire Harnesses

Interconnecting cables for drivers, fixtures, and LED arrays.

  • • Multi-branch designs
  • • Custom configurations
  • • Shielded available

Driver Cable Assemblies

Power input/output cables for LED drivers and power supplies.

  • • Various gauges
  • • Strain relief
  • • Custom connectors

Lighting Industry Compliance & Testing

✓ UL Listed Components

UL certified wires and connectors compliant with lighting safety standards.

✓ Current Capacity Testing

Verified current ratings for safe LED power delivery applications.

✓ Temperature Validation

Tested for LED operating temperatures and thermal cycling conditions.

✓ 100% Electrical Testing

Continuity and insulation testing on every assembly for reliable performance.

LED Project Examples

LED Strip Connection Kit

Complete wire assembly kit for connecting LED strips to power supplies. Includes 2-pin and 4-pin configurations in custom lengths.

PH Series 2-Pin & 4-Pin Custom Lengths

LED Driver Harness Assembly

Multi-branch cable assembly connecting LED driver to multiple LED modules. Color-coded for easy installation.

Multi-Branch Color-Coded UL Listed

Channel Letter Lighting Wire

Weather-resistant wire assemblies for outdoor LED channel letter signage. IP67-rated connectors.

Weather-Resistant IP67

LED Wire Gauge Selection Guide

Application Recommended Wire Gauge Current Capacity
Low-power LED strips 24-22 AWG Up to 1.5A
Medium-power LED modules 20-18 AWG Up to 4A
High-power LED arrays 16-14 AWG Up to 10A
LED driver input power 18-16 AWG Up to 6A

LED Wiring Project Requirements?

From prototype to production, we deliver LED terminal wire solutions optimized for lighting applications.
